topic: This house would ban partial birth abortions
claim: moral right to life of human beings (human organisms) begins at or near conception-fertilization
premise: modern embryology shows that the embryo begins to exist at conception and has a natural capacity for complex mental qualities, therefore the right to life begins at conception
